name: Signal Relay
description:
3022 AD

A large and mysterious mass has appeared at the edge of the solar system

From it comes endless waves of drones, all headed straight to your home planet

Defend your home planet from any and all invaders

Make your way to the edge of the solar system to confront the source of the intruders

This is all complicated by the fact that as your ship is remotely controlled, the further away from your home planet you are, the greater the your input lag will be

Buy signal boosters to relay your signal

Good luck
